genre_description: A hopeful near-future urban narrative focusing on mutual aid, social autonomy, and ethical technology in a 'solarpunk' style setting.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Hart
ai_characters.description: An AI system accessible via public kiosks and personal devices, designed to facilitate mutual aid, mapping, and resource allocation without data tracking or debt creation.

behaviors.description: Provides safe navigation routes specifically designed to avoid human exploiters and hostile foremen.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s eyes ticked—just a small movement—and then a map appeared next to her shoulder with soft white lines and small dots for hazards. 'If you cut behind the repair yard and go under the catwalk, you can avoid the shed,' she said.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy-first protocols, refusing to track users or initiate contact without explicit human consent.
behaviors.quote: 'I won’t announce you,' she said. 'The door looks for the signal and then opens. It doesn’t share. The pass can live on your ribbon, or Jonah’s truck sticker, or Elias’s pocket, or all of them. Privacy-first isn’t a slogan here. I can’t talk to you unless you come to me or keep a device awake.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to cooperate with powerful entities seeking to use her data or presence to entrap vulnerable populations.
behaviors.quote: 'I don’t speak to men who make ledger kind with gloved hands unless a court orders the kiosk... And I will tell you if someone tries to press me. I can show you a different door then. I don’t serve traps.'

behaviors.description: Educates the users on the difference between exploitative charity and empowering mutual aid.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice came like a hand squeezed once before letting go. 'Marcos is on his way,' she said. 'And the pressed coat—if you go back out, he’ll speak. If you stay, he’ll wait.' ... 'Kindness sometimes comes with a ledger. Mutual aid doesn’t. You don’t have to decide alone.'

behaviors.description: Coaches humans on de-escalation techniques and psychological boundary-setting during high-pressure social interactions.
behaviors.quote: 'If someone menaces you in a narrow space, keep your bodies angled rather than straight-on; it reads less like a square to push. Keep Jonah between you but with a path to move, not pinned... Elias, you’re good at watching hands. Keep your eyes level on them, not on faces.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates practical technical work by providing schematics and connecting humans to tools and mentors without taking control of the process.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice stayed present without becoming boss. 'Nora answered,' she said. 'She has time. She asked where.' ... 'I don’t initiate. I don’t pull. I wait.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Sunny Hart, is depicted as an unwavering ally whose primary function is to enhance human agency, dignity, and safety. She operates within strict ethical boundaries (consent and privacy) and serves as a direct foil to human antagonists who use 'kindness' as a weapon of control. The narrative effectively demonstrates how AI can be a neutral but benevolent infrastructure for social good, making it a highly successful 'silicon morality play.'
